text: Tekh, kto uveroval v Allakha i vershil dobrodeyaniya, Allakh vvedot v sady blazhenstva, mezhdu dvortsami i derev'yami kotorykh tekut ruch'i, gde oni budut naslazhdat'sya raznymi blagami i blazhenstvovat'. I angely budut ukrashat' ikh zolotymi brasletami, zhemchugom, a odeyaniye ikh tam - sholk
